Title: Gather Up the Killers
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michael Russo, Michael Narducci, Carina Adly MacKenzie (executive story editor), Kyle Arrington (story editor), Beau DeMayo (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: On the fifth anniversary the Mikaelsons defeat, Marcel is king of the city and welcomes the unsired vampires to New Orleans, only to find they pose an unexpected threat to his rule, leading him to seek counsel from an unlikely source.
